column4: hello.  I keep getting a Connection Failed error between my laptop and my Sony Ericsson T637.  They were working fine, I got a wireless headset (now turned off) and things went to hell. The laptop can send and receive files from the phone, but Multisync stopped working.
do u mind telling me which program you were using to sync your T637, i am using the msae, but dunno how to sync it?
multisync should be able to connect Ev2 and the T637, as I said: it was working for me...
